Description of Criteria
C1 - CPU Frequency (GHz): Benefit (Higher speed is preferred)
C2 - RAM Capacity (MB): Benefit (More memory is advantageous)
C3 - Expansion Modules Count: Benefit (More expansion support is better)
C4 - MTBF (Mean Time Between Failures (Hours)): Benefit (Longer MTBF is better)
C5 - Communication Protocols Count: Benefit (More protocol support is better)
C6 - Energy Consumption (Watt): Cost (Lower consumption is preferred)
C7 - Installation Cost (Euro): Cost (Lower cost is preferred)
C8 - Maintenance Cost (Euro/Year): Cost (Lower maintenance cost is preferred)
C9 - Supported Programming Language Count: Benefit (More languages provide flexibility)
C10 - Service Completion Time (Hours): Cost(Shorter completion time is preferred)
